title: Elissa~sH
author: Elissa~sH
content: I am new here few days ago I read post about bull market here.  And I read everyone's replies and understood a lot and didn't fully understand.  Tell me exactly what is the matter?

comments.author: serjent05
comments.body: Bitcoin bull market is the event where Bitcoin Market is in a bull run which means Bitcoin is highly in demand.  The market sentiment is highly positive and the price is rallying up.  Mostly bull markets will have a sustained price increase.  According to Investopedia, it is the time when bull market  condition is rising or expected to be rising[1] while in the dictionary it is stated that a bull market is the time when the price increases and encourages buying.QuoteDictionaryDefinitions from Oxford Languages · Learn morebull mar·ket/ˌbo͝ol ˈmärkət/nounSTOCK MARKETa market in which share prices are rising, encouraging buying.Applying that to Bitcoin, it is the state where the market price, market volume, and market demand are rising and the market sentiment encourages buying.[1] https://www.investopedia.com/terms/b/bullmarket.asp

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: A bull market is a market where assets are rising in value. Conversely, when assets are falling in value, such a market is called a bear market. The term "bullish" comes from the analogy that a bull beats its horns from the bottom up, and the term "bearish" comes from the analogy that a bear beats its paw from the top down.

comments.author: criptoevangelista
comments.body: The financial market moves in waves, what we call a cycle, there are downward cycles in which prices become increasingly lower, that is, there is a market selling more than buying, and a bull market, in which buying demand exceeds sellers, driving prices up.Generally, to make money in this, the investor needs to wait for the bear market to buy good assets at the lowest possible price... then wait for time to pass and the cycle changes to a bull market, thus selling and making a profit, remember , this movement takes months to happen, it’s not the next day.

comments.author: SOKO-DEKE
comments.body: Quote from: Elissa~sH on February 14, 2024, 03:21:08 PMI am new here few days ago I read post about bull market here.  And I read everyone's replies and understood a lot and didn't fully understand.  Tell me exactly what is the matter?During a bull run in the Bitcoin market, it is a time when the price of Bitcoin consistently rises due to increased demand, there is a continuous upward movement in the price fueled by the growing interest in Bitcoin. This heightened demand is a result of various factors, including the limited supply of Bitcoin and its volatile nature. With a limited supply and increasing demand, the price of Bitcoin tends to soar, as more people seek to invest in it. This phenomenon creates a cycle where the more people desire Bitcoin, the higher its price climbs.

comments.author: franky1
comments.body: alot of people think any and all ups are bull and all downs are bears.. which makes people confused as to when there is true bull and bear..this quick doodle may helpdont treat all ups and downs as bulls and bears. call the small fluctuations as something else like cubs and calves. the bulls and bears are the significant changes leading upto a ATH(bull) and after a ATH(bear)

comments.author: Faisal2202
comments.body: Quote from: Elissa~sH on February 14, 2024, 03:21:08 PMI am new here few days ago I read post about bull market here.  And I read everyone's replies and understood a lot and didn't fully understand.  Tell me exactly what is the matter?A bull market means the market is going up or is ready to go up, basically, there are 3 phases in crypto market that are bull, bear, and accumulation. There are many others if we go deep into the mico level but generally, these are the ones mostly used. To understand this you have to understand what is halving and after how much time it occurs. Halving is the period when the supply of some coin is cut to half. And BTC halving is going to happen in a few days (halving count down).It happens after every four years, so after every four years there comes these phases accordingly, after halving it comes bull, then bear and then accumulation. Now halving is near and that's why people are saying market is bullish and its the time to make some money but that's not for guaranteed also, you have to do your full research before choosing which coin to invest in.

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: A Bull Market is a period where prices in assets generally have a sustained upwards price trajectory. A Bear Market is the opposite. Many things can dictate market sentiment such as global events but as tar as cryptocurrency is involved we have long periods when it can be said we are neither in a Bull or Bear Market, we have long Crab Markets which is a light hearted way of saying sideways. For the Bitcoin naysayers, you will soon find out what a Bitcoin Bull Market is.

comments.author: kuriboh
comments.body: Quote from: Elissa~sH on February 14, 2024, 03:21:08 PMI am new here few days ago I read post about bull market here.  And I read everyone's replies and understood a lot and didn't fully understand.  Tell me exactly what is the matter?Ok, nice to see you want to know and learn something as a newbie. The bull market is an important time for the bitcoin price to move forward.  When financial markets experience rising asset prices, Bitcoin refers to holding stocks in a bull run market. Indicates investor sentiment and expectations of continued growth.If you want to be more clear, then you can read the bull market articles of the first sites by searching on Google, and the easiest way is to search on YouTube, You will get many videos and watch them, and then you will understand about the bull market.

comments.author: aoluain
comments.body: There are two references which are made to the markets, both the Bitcoin market and othertraditional markets, BULL market and BEAR market.The general consensus is that a BULL market is a positive outlook and the market prices move upwards, this can coincide with external or related events, in this case the upcoming BitcoinHalving event. There is an air of positivity so the markets move up, the Bulls are aggressive and are buying.In contrast to the BULL market is the BEAR market. What do bears do in winter? Hibernate,which means little or no activity. In terms of the markets they either stagnate or fall back.

comments.author: Alana Arden
comments.body: Quote from: Elissa~sH on February 14, 2024, 03:21:08 PMI am new here few days ago I read post about bull market here.  And I read everyone's replies and understood a lot and didn't fully understand.  Tell me exactly what is the matter?Market volatility is mainly coming from two directions. One is a "Bull market" and the other is a "Bear market."A Bull market refers to a rising market where most investors are buying, demand exceeds supply, market conditions are high and prices are high. And an investor who believes that prices will rise over time is called a "Bull". That is, when prices in a market move rapidly upward, most investors become "Bullish" about rising prices. Simply put, a Bull run or Bull market begins when the market experiences sustained or significant upward growth in the financial markets.       On the other hand, when financial market conditions are down, it is called Bear market.

comments.author: Odusko
comments.body: Bull market is when the price off a coin do an extremely high increase that crosses above 2x to 10x of its price and also attains a new price high that has not been recorded before in the history of the coin.We have to make it clear that not only Bitcoin does an all-time high or a bull market movement, but all other coins do the same movement at some point in time, so we have two types of market movement.1 bull market, this is when the price of the coin moves in a speedy rapid movement upward. 2 we have a bear market and this kind of market condition is the opposite of what the bull market and this is when the price of Bitcoin drops significantly down in a short period.

comments.author: LesterD
comments.body: Quote from: Elissa~sH on February 14, 2024, 03:21:08 PMI am new here few days ago I read post about bull market here.  And I read everyone's replies and understood a lot and didn't fully understand.  Tell me exactly what is the matter?A Bull market is when the price of Bitcoin rises, and it gets its name from the attack pattern of a bull, which is to lower its head before immediately going up. Conversely, a Bear market is when the market price is going down and gets its name from the attack pattern of a bear, which is to swing its arm from the top and go down.

comments.author: Dave1
comments.body: Quote from: Elissa~sH on February 14, 2024, 03:21:08 PMI am new here few days ago I read post about bull market here.  And I read everyone's replies and understood a lot and didn't fully understand.  Tell me exactly what is the matter?Bitcoin market has bear and bull cycle.In bear market, the price tends to go down.In bull market, the price goes up and that's why everyone is very excited to see it once again. Usually happens right after the block halving. In this case it will be around after April this year.

comments.author: GbitG
comments.body: Hmm, we are welcome to come over here. But anyway, let's go to the topic of what a bull market is. In general a Bull market means the Bitcoin price is moved to rise, I mean the time period in which the Bitcoin price is raised due to the high Buyer volume. In simple words we can say that the bull market is a market in which price will rise and asset value will increase more and more with the aspect of profit gaining. While its reverse phase is called the bear market, in which the price generally falls due to selling volume, It means that the assets drop due to selling pressure and their value decreases, which means they lose value.

comments.author: The Cryptovator
comments.body: Anyone related to crypto, Almost everyone is familiar with the bull market. A bull market occurs when there are significant uptrends in price movements and continuous uptrends in price. There would be a dump as well, but compared with the pump, the dump would be too small. However, you need to spend more time on the forum to understand everything related to the bull market and other things related to crypto. Suddenly, you can't understand everything from here. I just try to explain in a simple way.

comments.author: jossiel
comments.body: You've got a lot of answers already and questions like this can be found on google with a quick search and even with the search box at the right top. Time to lock the thread as answers will be repeated. Btw, welcome to bitcointalk.

comments.author: Tipeform$
comments.body: Quote from: Elissa~sH on February 14, 2024, 03:21:08 PMI am new here few days ago I read post about bull market here.  And I read everyone's replies and understood a lot and didn't fully understand.  Tell me exactly what is the matter?If I explain about bull market then I must assume that the market is good and the period of growth. A bull market is when the market is doing very well and prices are going up a lot. Again, bear market is when the market is dumping a lot and bad conditions are created in the market. During a bear market there is a lot of dumping in the market. If we talk about the current market we can definitely point to the bull market as the market is very bullish now and may generate new ATH very soon.

comments.author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
comments.body: Just like everyone has already mentioned, a bull market is a period in the market where the price keeps surging high. Even as the price keeps going high, it can still fall, but not really very significantly, and it will just rise again. In a different term, the bull market is when most Bitcoin investors sell off their Bitcoin that was bought during the bear market, because in the bull market, they assume to have made a huge profit from their investment.Bitcoin's bull market usually starts in the year of every bitcoin halving, but the peak of the bull market usually occurs a year after the halving has taken place. The peak bull market will give rise to an all-time high price of bitcoin before the bear market will begin to settle in.

comments.author: Patrol69
comments.body: An increase in the price of Bitcoin is generally known as a bull market and a decrease in the price of Bitcoin is known as a bear market. The Bitcoin market is constantly going up, so we can call this market a bull market. I can see that the market is constantly rising for some time. Now the market position is fifty two thousand dollars. The market has touched its highest price since last few years and the market is still positive. If the market continues to grow the way it has in the last few days, it won't take long to cross its all-time highs.
